Text.Page:
! Good to see you again. Are you ready for your second task?

As with the first task, you'll need to demonstrate your proficiency by clearing two dungeons suitable for your level, or just clear the same dungeon twice.

These dungeons will be harder than the last ones, so you're really going to be put to the test."I'm ready."

You are improving steadily, .

There's still more to do, though. Return to me when you're ready for more advanced training."Understood."
